item.title: 中国股市抹去三月涨幅，政策驱动的反弹失效
item.description: 中国股市抹去了 3 月份的涨幅，原因是盈利状况令人失望，削弱了人们对 2 月份开始的政策驱动型反弹的乐观情绪。【原文：Chinese stocks erased their gains for March as earnings disappointments eroded optimism around a policy-driven rally that began in February.】

item.title: 政府取消能源援助，西班牙通胀加速
item.description: 2022年10月20日星期四，西班牙巴塞罗那桑茨区的 "Gracia Participa "社区储藏室里的一箱箱存货。西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）呼吁当地食品杂货零售商抑制食品价格上涨，因为他的政府正在继续寻求控制几十年来最严重的生活成本危机的方法。摄影师：Angel Garcia/Bloomberg【原文：Boxes of stock at the ‘Gracia Participa’ community pantry, where users in need shop using a credit system, in the Sants district of Barcelona, Spain, on Thursday, Oct. 20, 2022. Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez called on local grocery retailers to restrain price increases on food, as his government continues to seek ways to control the worst cost of living crisis in decades. Photographer: Angel Garcia/Bloomberg】

item.title: 泰国考虑将预算支持作为 140 亿美元数字钱包计划的备选方案
item.description: 泰国总理沙威信（Srettha Thavisin）通过一次性借款振兴疲软经济的旗舰计划面临重重障碍，泰国政府将权衡从国家预算中拨款 140 亿美元的方案。【原文：Thailand’s government will weigh the option of funding a $14 billion cash handout plan from the state budget, as Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin’s flagship program to revive a sluggish economy through a one-time borrowing faces hurdles.】

item.title: 日本三井物产与罗东制药据说接近达成收购中药公司的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括日本三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.）和乐敦制药株式会社（Rohto Pharmaceutical Co.【原文：A group including Japan’s Mitsui & Co. and Rohto Pharmaceutical Co. is nearing a deal to acquire a majority stake in medicine and health-care company Eu Yan Sang International Ltd., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 央行反击，台湾交易员重新思考加息路径
item.description: 在台湾央行行长发出上周的加息只是一次性的信号后，台湾掉期交易商迅速收回了对政策利率持续上调的押注。【原文：Taiwan swaps traders are quickly dialing back bets on a sustained increase in policy rates, after the island’s central bank chief signaled that last week’s hike was a one-off.】

item.title: 伊萨卡能源公司研究埃尼英国上游资产交易
item.description: 北海油气生产商 Ithaca Energy Plc 就收购 Eni SpA 英国上游资产的潜在交易签订了排他性协议。【原文：North Sea oil and gas producer Ithaca Energy Plc entered into an exclusivity agreement in relation to a potential deal for Eni SpA’s UK upstream assets.】

item.title: 季度销售额超过预期，H&M 盈利能力增强
item.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB 公司第一季度的营业利润率有所增长，因为这家瑞典快速时尚专业公司更加注重提高盈利能力。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB posted a stronger operating margin in the first quarter as the Swedish fast-fashion specialist tightens its focus on improving profitability.】

item.title: 中国大豆贸易缺口引发数据可靠性质疑
item.description: 对中国经济数据可靠性的怀疑再次涌上心头&mdash；这次是在大豆贸易方面，因为这个世界第一大进口国公布的数据与其他国家的估计越来越不一致。【原文：Doubts over the reliability of China’s economic figures are swirling again — this time in soybean trade as the world’s top importer has been publishing data that are increasingly diverging from other estimates.】

item.title: 印度债券一年来最大幅度的全球下挫昭示卢比风险
item.description: 印度卢比周五跌至历史新低，促使外国投资者重新评估他们疯狂购买该国资产的行为，引发了印度债券一年来最大的一次抛售。【原文：The Indian rupee’s decline to a record low on Friday pushed foreign investors to reassess their frenzied buying of the country’s assets, triggering the biggest selloff in Indian bonds in a year.】

item.description: 中国前女首富仍在从她摇摇欲坠的地产帝国中获取暴利。【原文：China’s former richest woman is still reaping a windfall from her crumbling property empire.】

item.title: 马来西亚考虑将价值 100 亿美元的铁路延伸至泰国边境
item.description: 马来西亚正在考虑将其正在进行的价值 500 亿林吉特（106 亿美元）的铁路项目延伸至与泰国接壤的边境，以减少与东南亚邻国的经济竞争。【原文：Malaysia is considering extending its ongoing 50 billion ringgit ($10.6 billion) rail project closer to its border with Thailand, as it seeks to reduce economic competition with its Southeast Asian neighbor.】

item.title: 保加利亚即将举行即席投票，新内阁竞选将以失败告终
item.description: 由于保加利亚第二大党将不再试图组建政府，保加利亚距离举行三年多来的第六次大选--即临时投票--越来越近了。【原文：Bulgaria is getting closer to a snap vote, the sixth general election in just over three years, as the country’s second-biggest party won’t try to form a government.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车制造出史无前例的柴油车
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）本周生产出最后一辆柴油发动机汽车，结束了这家计划到 2030 年只生产电动汽车的制造商的时代。【原文：Volvo Car AB produced its last automobile with a diesel engine this week, ending an era for the manufacturer that plans to only make electric vehicles by 2030.】

item.title: 非凡 "业务增长推动 Old Mutual 利润增长 35
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd. 表示，受非洲资产规模最大的保险公司新业务 "超常规 "增长和市场份额增长的推动，去年利润激增 35%。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. said profit surged 35% last year, driven by “exceptional” growth in new business at Africa’s biggest insurer by assets and by market-share gains.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克不否认市场对 6 月降息的看法
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，通胀正在回落，6 月份可能是欧洲中央银行开始降低借贷成本的好时机，正如投资者所预期的那样。【原文：Inflation is on the back foot and June may be a good time for the European Central Bank to begin lowering borrowing costs, as investors expect, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 马克龙希望管理欧洲的外交政策。并非所有人都同意
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙不需要发布自己殴打沙袋的图片，就能告诉全世界他准备好战斗了。【原文：Emmanuel Macron didn’t need to release images of himself walloping a punching bag to tell the world he was up for a fight.】

item.title: 比亚迪业绩不佳引发两个月来最严重股价暴跌
item.description: 在竞争激烈的中国电动汽车市场，即使是微小的盈利亏损也会成为引人注目的新闻，比亚迪周三就发现了这一点。【原文：In China’s highly competitive electric vehicle market, even a small earnings miss is conspicuous news as BYD found out Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长寻求深化与亚洲经济体的货币关系
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜表示，中国将致力于加强与亚洲经济体的货币合作，以增强该地区的金融稳定性。【原文：People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said the country will aim to boost currency cooperation with Asian economies to enhance financial stability in the region.】

item.title: 香港市场萎靡不振，阿里巴巴再失大单
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）取消了其物流业务部门的上市计划，这使香港上市市场复苏的最后一大希望破灭，也给金融中心的领导者们带来了寻找新的复兴之路的压力。【原文：One of Hong Kong’s last big hopes for a resurgence of its IPO market has been dashed by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s move to scrap a listing of its logistics unit, piling pressure on the financial hub’s leaders to find new paths to a revival.】

item.title: 新加坡顶级写字楼租金跃升至 2008 年以来最高点
item.description: 新加坡第一季度的写字楼租金创下了 15 年来的新高，一反困扰其他主要金融中心的商业地产不景气局面。【原文：Office rents in Singapore reached a 15-year high in the first quarter, defying the commercial property slump plaguing other major financial hubs.】

item.title: Astra 分拆药品生产以防范地缘政治风险
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）正在制定全球生产网络计划，该网络将独立向主要市场供应药品，因为美国正努力减少制药业对中国的依赖。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc is fleshing out plans for a global manufacturing network that will independently supply medicine to major markets as the US pushes to reduce the pharmaceutical industry’s reliance on China.】

item.title: 阿曼成为船对船转运俄罗斯石油的热点地区
item.description: 随着美国加强对石油运输的审查，阿曼附近海域正成为船对船运输俄罗斯石油前往印度的热点地区。【原文：The waters off Oman are emerging as a hot spot for ship-to-ship transfers of Russian oil heading to India, as the US steps up scrutiny of the flows.】

item.title: 金属反弹先于需求复苏，铝价下跌
item.description: 铝与其他工业金属一起下跌，原因是近期价格上涨遇到了最大消费国中国购买兴趣不足的问题。【原文：Aluminum fell with other industrial metals, as the recent rally in prices runs into a lack of buying interest in China, the top consuming country.】

item.title: 日元跌至 1990 年以来最低点
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率跌至约 34 年来的最弱水平，引发了人们对日本将加大力度减缓汇率下跌的猜测。【原文：The yen slid to weakest level in about 34 years against the dollar, fanning speculation that Japan will step up its effort to slow the decline.】

item.title: 干预在即，日元期权大额押注风险压垮交易者
item.description: 近 30 亿美元的美元-日元期权即将到期，这令交易员们惶惶不安，因为日本货币正徘徊在可能引发政府干预的水平边缘。【原文：The imminent expiry of nearly $3 billion in dollar-yen options has traders on edge as the Japanese currency teeters on the brink of levels that might trigger government intervention.】

item.title: 香港购房者避开二手房，涌向新项目
item.description: 政府上月减税后，香港购房者纷纷抢购新房。【原文：Hong Kong homebuyers are snapping up new properties after the government cut taxes last month.】
